sn22.119:1.3: Do you regard form like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self’?”
sn22.119:1.6: Form should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn22.119:1.10: consciousness like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self’?”
sn22.119:1.13: Consciousness should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
sn22.119:1.15: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
